## ShaderHelper.getProjectionMatrixJitterValue() method

Gets the uniform variable of type vec2 which holds the jitter value of the projection matrix of current camera

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getProjectionMatrixJitterValue(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope): PBShaderExp;
```

</td><td>

Current shader scope


</td></tr>

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

The jitter value of projection matrix of current camera
